pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Christy Clark, Premier of British Columbia | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with Christy Clark, Premier of British Columbia.

The leaders discussed the Government of Canadaâ€™s announcement on decisions related to energy and the environment. The leaders agreed on the importance to take a balanced approach to the development of natural resources to help ensure the environment is protected, while creating jobs, including jobs in British Columbia.

The Prime Minister and the Premier will continue to collaborate on issues related to the environment and energy, as well as other shared interests.
